participant_2.background:
I try to have a good relationship with my family, but it can be difficult because I am often busy with work.
I joined a new gym near my home in New Mexico to continue my athletic pursuits.
i live with my boyfriend in an apartment.
i am 7 foot tall.
I sometimes spend too much time procrastinating on my homework.

content.text: Hey! I'm from Toronto and I spend a lot of time in my garden. How about you?
Hey there! I live in New Mexico and just joined a new gym. What kind of garden do you have?
I have a vegetable garden and a flower garden. I love to grow my own vegetables and flowers.
That's so cool! I wish I had a garden. I'm not very good at keeping plants alive, but I'm trying to learn.
It's not too hard, just takes a little bit of time and effort.
I know, I just need to find the time. What kind of vegetables do you grow?
I grow tomatoes, peppers, cucumbers, zucchini, and squash. I also grow some herbs like basil, oregano, and thyme.
Those sound delicious! I love fresh tomatoes and basil.
Me too! I love to use them in salads and pasta dishes.
I'm getting hungry just thinking about it
